thumbro-invalid-file: Error message when SpecialVipsTest was given a non existent or invalid file name
thumbro-invalid-width:
Error message when SpecialVipsTest did not get a valid width parameter

See also {{msg-mw|Vipsscaler-invalid-sharpen}}
thumbro-invalid-sharpen:
Error message when SpecialVipsTest did not get a valid sharpen parameter

See also {{msg-mw|Vipsscaler-invalid-width}}
thumbro-thumb-error: Error message when libvips did not manage to generate a thumbnail
thumbro-thumb-notscaled: Error message when libvips did not scale the thumbnail.
thumbro-form-legend: Special:ThumbroTest form: legend at top of the form
thumbro-form-width: Special:ThumbroTest form: label for the width input box
thumbro-form-file: Special:ThumbroTest form: label for the file input box
thumbro-form-sharpen-radius: Special:ThumbroTest form: label for the sharpening amount input box
thumbro-form-bilinear: Special:ThumbroTest form: Checkbox label to determine whether to enable bilinear scaling
thumbro-form-submit: Special:ThumbroTest form: submit button text. The page will then attempt to generate a thumbnail with the given parameters.
thumbro-thumbs-legend: Used as header for the result on [[wikipedia:Special:ThumbroTest|Special:ThumbroTest]]
thumbro-thumbs-help: Used as help text for the result on [[wikipedia:Special:ThumbroTest|Special:ThumbroTest]]
thumbro-original-image: Special:ThumbroTest: caption of the original image
thumbro-default-thumb: Special:ThumbroTest: caption of the default thumbnail
thumbro-thumbro-thumb: Special:ThumbroTest: caption of the thumbro thumbnail
thumbro-show-both: Special:ThumbroTest: button to show both thumbnails
thumbro-show-default: Special:ThumbroTest: button to show default thumbnail only
thumbro-show-vips: Special:ThumbroTest: button to show libvips thumbnail only
